title: disconnecting FPS drops
body: So, about two months ago i was using a older lap top and had steady FPS of 70 while on the highest settings, then all of a sudden i had drastic FPS drops to like 1-10 so that i couldn't even play. I changed all the in game settings and settings on my computer and still couldn't play. So fast forward to now, i just got a new Dell Inspiron 15, 7000 series and my FPS seems to be working okay yet, i will get in a game for about one minute and the game disconnects and then won't let me back in. This has been a long and drawn out process, which i figured getting a top of the line brand new computer would resolve, someone help?

replies.body: It sounds like your you're having a network issue staying connected to the game server, so it may not necessarily be with your new PC.  You should go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to configure your settings on your new rig and rule out possibilities.  Test it in a custom game, and let me know if you run into any issues!
